travelMode:google.maps.TravelMode.DRIVING});setDirectionsResponse(googleResults);setDistance(googleResults.routes[0].legs[0].distance.text);setDuration(googleResults.routes[0].legs[0].duration.text);// Get the coordinates of source and destination

if(onRouteCalculated){onRouteCalculated(source,destination,routeResponse.data.route);}// Get ML-based travel time prediction
